description.displayText: Our family loves Lori!  We've been so lucky to have her with us for 2.5 years.  She is everything you'd want as a parent in a nanny - responsible, communicative, punctual, loving and caring.  She sees our kids as hers and treats them the same - reinforcing our schedules and house rules - a true extension of us when we're not there. We couldn't be happier to have found her.
description.originalText: Our family loves Lori!  We've been so lucky to have her with us for 2.5 years. description.displayText: There are many things I can say about Lori, but the most important is that we trust her with our two young children. She is amazing with them- extremely attentive, loving and interacts with them all day. My kids love Lori and so do we. I'm so thankful to have found such an incredible childcare provider.
description.originalText: There are many things I can say about Lori, but the most important is that we trust her with our two young children. She is amazing with them- extremely attentive, loving and interacts with them all day. My kids love Lori and so do we. I'm so thankful to have found such an incredible childcare provider.

description.displayText: Lori Is a wonderful childcare provider. She's been working with me and my 4 children for the past 5 years and we have nothing but positive things to say about her.  She is punctual and trustworthy and I never have to worry about my children in her care. She has watched my boys from ages 3 and 4 till now and my twins from 6months till now.  She always tries to get them out and playing or creates fun things for them to do around the house. She has become like family to us and we are so thankful to have found her through care.com
